subject: Re: Staging Site access
preview: Hey Samir,  No problem at all, always happy to help and jump in however I can!  Let me know if anything else comes up or if there’s anything more I can support you with.

full_threads.body:
Hey Samir,

No problem at all, always happy to help and jump in however I can!

Let me know if anything else comes up or if there’s anything more I can support you with.

Amazing, thank you Allie.

Kind Regards,

Samir Bhatta IT Support | Bachelors of IT |

Proudly Supporting

Hi Samir,

Thank you so much for the confirmation.

We've now pushed everything live and have also manually updated the plugins.

If anything comes up or you need further support, feel free to let me know.

Hi Allie,

Everything looks fine. Please make it live, and if anything comes up. I will let you know

Thank you for your support

Kind Regards,

Hi Samir,

Thank you so much for trusting us!

The updates are now complete at staging—this took about 15 minutes, and everything should be working as expected.

Feel free to take a look when you’re ready, and let me know if anything stands out before we push it live.

Always happy to help if anything else comes up!

Thanks for checking, Allie. Once it's ready, just let me know so I can do a final review before we take it live.

Kind Regards,

Samir Bhatta IT Support | Bachelors of IT |

Proudly Supporting

Hi Samir,

Thank you so much for the note.

I had a quick chat with Joel, this fix and should only take about 15 minutes to copy the code across and get everything back up and running.

Upon checking, we also discovered that the plugin version has no major differences, which makes the update even quicker.

Also, just a heads-up, you still have 1 hour and 45 minutes remaining in your plan for July, so we’re all good to go if you'd like us to proceed!

Thank you so much for trusting us—always happy to help and here if you need anything!

Hi Allie,
If it helps, we've encountered this issue multiple times before, and Joel had fixed it. You might find more information by checking the support ticket that was raised at the time.

Kind Regards,

Samir Bhatta IT Support | Bachelors of IT |

Proudly Supporting

Hi Samir,

I hope you're doing well.

Thanks for the detailed notes—super helpful!

Here’s a quick update on where things stand:
  • Hidden Product Sample Button: This will take around 1–2 hours. We'll need to locate the custom code from the previous development team and reapply it to the updated plugin version.

  • Price Calculation Delay & Site Performance: These issues are happening because we're currently on the staging site, which naturally runs a bit slower than live since the resources are limited.

Let me know if you need anything else or if you'd like us to move ahead with the custom code migration. Always happy to help!

Hi Team,
I have updated a few plugins on the staging site and need your assistance in resolving the following issues:


  1. Hidden Product Sample Button:
    Joel mentioned that there was custom code implemented by the development team for the product sample plugin. Currently, the "Sample" button is not visible on the product page.
    → Please investigate and ensure it functions as it does on the live site.


  2. Price Calculation Delay:
    There appears to be a noticeable delay in the total price calculation when the quantity is increased or decreased, and also after clicking "Add to Cart."
    → Kindly look into optimizing this.


  3. Site Performance:
    The overall site performance seems slower than expected. Not sure staging site has to do anything with this.
    → Please analyze and suggest or implement improvements to enhance load times.


Let me know if you need any further details. Also please provide the time allocation in advance? I need to obtain approval for any additional time that may be required.
Thanks,

Kind Regards,

Samir Bhatta IT Support | Bachelors of IT |

Proudly Supporting
